item.description:
Hey Everyone! There's a pre-Halloween party at Lazy Lizard on Saturday. Its going to rock! Hope you all can come!!!  We'll be partying downstairs, call/text if you have trouble finding me.

No cover. 2 DJs that night. DJ Chris will be opening up that night with the best of Top 40. Followed by the best in House/Euro/dubstep music by Pav Lov. You do not want to miss this.

Add some spook to the night by coming in your Halloween costume.

A professional photographer will be on scene taking shots so bring ur swagger!

HOST: Rebecca, 203-917-0866 (texting is fine too)
item.name: Sat 10/22 - Halloween Pre-Party at Lazy Lizard
